title: Cuba
summary: Cuba is a country in Caribbean. The capital is Havana. Population: 9.7 million. Area: 109,884 kmÂ².

images.alt: The flag of Cuba is composed of five equal horizontal bands of blue alternating with white and a red equilateral triangle superimposed on the hoist side of the field. The triangle has its base on the hoist end, spans about two-fifth the width of the field and bears a white five-pointed star at its center.

attribution.note: National flags are in the public domain.
